<<<<<<< HEAD
A satyr against brandy. Written by Jo. Hains, as he saith himself. Haines, Joseph, d. 1701.
1 sheet (2 p.).
Printed for Jos. Hindmarsh at the Black-Bull in Cornhill, [London] : 1683.
Verse: "Farewell damn'd Stygian juice, who dost bewitch ..." Place of publication from Wing. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
